Title: A beginner's guide to mapping arrays in EF Core 8 - .NET Blog
Description: EF Core 8 introduces support for mapping typed arrays of simple values to database columns so the semantics of the mapping can be used in the SQL generated from LINQ queries.

Title: Why does Global­Lock max out at 255 locks? - The Old New Thing
Description: Because that's how many bits were available for reporting the lock count.
